attributes.action: International sports with the home nations competing should all be on free to air TV
attributes.additional_details:
Popular International Sporting Events that include the "Home Nations" taking part, should be shown live at all times on Free-To-Air television, so that everybody has the opportunity to cheer on their country without any financial restrictions.

This should include all International Rugby, Football and Cricket Games, as these are the most popular of sports in the UK
